OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord modality best suit patient . Patients assign 1 2 group . All patient undergo excisional biopsy needle localization removal tumor . Patients margin < 2 mm undergo re-excision biopsy cavity . - Group 1 : Patients undergo partial breast irradiation deliver single intra-operative radiation dose tumor bed . - Group 2 : Patients undergo partial breast irradiation deliver Mammosite® brachytherapy consist 10 fraction 5 day . Quality life assess baseline , 1 month completion radiotherapy , follow-up visit . After completion study treatment , patient follow 1 month , every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 5 year .
